alert.note: Alert for Austin; Inland Harris; Waller; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 10:14PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Austin, southeastern Washington, northwestern Waller and northwestern Harris Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Brenham, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hempstead, Prairie View, Pine Island and Monaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
